title: Fullstack & Video Game Developer

hi: Hi!, I'm Gonzalo. Nice to meet you.
description: Since beginning my joirney as a freelance Fullstack nearly 10 years ago, I've done remote work for agencies, consulted for startups, and collaborated with talented people to create digital products for both business and consumer use. I'm quitely confident, naturally curious, and perpetually working on improving my chops one design problem at a time.
